description: We look back on the week's news and what's on our plate for the upcoming week.
teaser: We look back on the week's news and what's on our plate for the upcoming week.
contentencoded:
Shani Hilton, deputy editor for Buzzfeed and Shannon Bond, media correspondent for FT, join the show to talk about what's on their plate this week.

This weekend's reading list:

Washington Post: How Facebook and Twitter control what you see about Ferguson

The Atlantic: Daimler Employees Can Set Emails to Auto-Delete During Vacation

Buzzfeed: Nearly 400 people paid it forward at a Starbucks in Florida

title: Weekend Brunch: News and algorithms, auto-deleting email and paying it forward
